include_directories(posix)
set(SRCS
    posix/channel.cpp
    posix/io_error_handler.cpp
    posix/listener.cpp
    posix/mutex.cpp
    posix/network_utils.cpp
    posix/selector.cpp
    agent.cpp
    allocator.cpp
    c_interface.cpp
    channel.cpp
    channel_group.cpp
    channel_holder.cpp
    fatal_errors.cpp
    listener.cpp
    network_utils.cpp
    options.cpp
    parameter_entry.cpp
    parameter_iterator.cpp
    parameters-details.cpp
    parameters.cpp
    raw_buffer_data_source.cpp
    serialization.cpp)
add_library(yamicore STATIC ${SRCS})
